features: ANTI-COLIC BABY BOTTLE. Anti-Colic internal vent system is clinically proven to reduce colic. Decreases spit-up, burping and gas.
CONSISTENT FLOW RATE. Vacuum-free feeding is closest to breastfeeding and Dr. Brown’s silicone nipples provide a consistent flow so babies can feed at their own pace.
PRESERVES NUTRIENTS. The anti-colic vent system is proven to help preserve bottle milk nutrients and aids in digestion for a better night’s sleep.
BREASTFEEDING BOTTLE. The breast-like nipple shape encourages a proper latch for a more natural bottle feeding experience and eases the transition from breast to bottle and back again.
DISHWASHER SAFE. Safe for use in dishwasher (top rack only), electric and microwave sterilizers or boiling water. BPA Free. 5 oz/150 mL, Level 1 Nipple, 2-Pack, 0m+
body.description: Your options have never been better with Dr. Brown’s Natural Flow® Anti-Colic Options+™ Wide-Neck Baby Bottle. The anti-colic internal vent system is clinically proven to reduce colic. Dr. Brown’s® bottles provide a more comfortable feeding experience for baby by decreasing spit-up, burping and gas. This vacuum-free feeding is closest to breastfeeding and Dr. Brown’s® silicone nipples provide a consistent flow so baby can feed at their own pace. The breast-like nipple shape encourages a proper latch for a more natural bottle feeding experience and eases the transition from breast to bottle and back again. Dr. Brown’s vent system is proven to help preserve bottle milk nutrients and aids in digestion for a better night’s sleep. The silicone nipple, together with the internal vent system, offer a reliable and trusted bottle feeding experience that makes Dr. Brown’s the #1 Pediatrician Recommended Baby Bottle in the U.S.* Made to grow with baby, our bottle is designed to nourish through all of baby’s feeding stages and is recyclable. Safe for use in dishwasher (top rack only), electric and microwave sterilizers or boiling water. BPA Free. *IQVIA Health ProVoice Survey 2022

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite bottles!
reviews.reviewText: I have the regular narrow dr brown bottles as well, and these are by far my favorite! I have also tried philips avent & mam, and these definitely took first place out of all of them. the nipple is nice and soft and they are the only bottles that do NOT leak. My baby is really not picky with bottles but she definitely does her best with these ones. Also, A+ for designs! They are so stinkin cute!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the narrow necked bottles.
reviews.reviewText: These have quick become our favorite bottle. My husband and I have used many types of bottles (I worked in a nursery and we have 5 nieces and 1 nephew). We didn't know which we would settle on and had a handful of bottles we tried with our newborn. These he latches to the best, has the best burps with, and the least spit up. We bought the 9 oz version recently and are quite happy with then too. The animal designs are a cute touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and functional
reviews.reviewText: The designs are cute. The bottle mechanism works well. Fits in our bottle warmer. Easier to clean with a bottle brush than the narrower Dr. Brown's bottle. Overall very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby’s favorite bottle
reviews.reviewText: This is my baby’s favorite bottle out of all of the ones we have tried. The weight distribution is better than the slim bottles so she can hold it much easier on her own. The wide neck design makes it easier to clean as well. I have never had a leaking issue with these bottles, the only time I did was when my baby started struggling with the nipple size and was pushing it in, so I just sized up and no more leaks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only bottle my baby likes!
reviews.reviewText: My baby struggled with taking bottles in the first few months, and we tried so many different brands and styles. We finally landed on these wide neck Dr. Browns and she actually takes them! It also helps that they are cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We’ve tried many bottles but our baby seems to do best with the nipple and flow of these wide neck Dr brown bottles. The only thing is that they’re a pain to wash with the extra inner venting system. The bottle can be used without it but when I tired a couple times, I noticed that it creates a like a vacuum sensation and makes the nipple collapse a little while my baby is sucking on it. So I have to pull the nipple out of her mouth to let the air release and the nipple pops back up again. Kind of a pain.We also noticed that the bottle leaks sometimes while we’re feeding our baby. It doesn't happen all the time so we aren’t sure what causes it. It also leaks when we’re warming milk in the bottle in warm water. It seems like some sort of pressure is created in the bottle that makes the milk come out of the top. What helped with this was making sure the top is screwed on super tight but then it makes it hard to screw the top off after!Because of these issues, we would switch bottle brands but prefer not to since our baby does well with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buscando biberones para mi bebé decidí comprar los Dr Browns
reviews.reviewText: Me súper encantaron por estos no liquean la leche pero lo más pequeños si estos son perfecto lo que buscaba para mi bebé recién nacido tanto haci que ya compré para cuando tengas meses y coma más 🥰
Bottles leak after a few months of use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love love love these bottles! I bought for my baby as he was very colicky and he improved very soon after using these bottle. The designs are super cute and the bottles are very sturdy. I have now bought bigger teats as my baby has grown and they are easily replaced in the lids. Just make sure to use the white stopper if putting a full bottle in your bag to stop leaks. I learned this the hard way with a pram bag soaked through. They don't leak when feeding though which is confusing.
Super cute bottles, love the design as you don’t often see bottles with designs on them. I find they don’t leak like other Dr brown bottles do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Amazing product soo happy with the bottles.Only down side is it come with nipple size 1 so you would need to get additional nipple in the size suitable for your baby.We are on size 2 right now.
